metadata.name: Ara Guler Istanbul 001
metadata.description:
Original Artist signed and one edition. 

The owner of this NFT will also have a 70x100cm 
Hahnemühle Fine Art paper artist signed physical print.


He was born in 1928 in Istanbul. It is considered as the most important representative of creative photography in Turkey, which has gained an international reputation. He opened hundreds of exhibitions all over the world. Dozens of books have been published. He photographed and interviewed many world-famous people, from Bertrand Russell to Winston Churchill, from Arnold Toynbee to Picasso and Salvador Dali. Now you can have his signed photographs in our archive in this collection.


* 70x100cm Hahnemühle Matt Fibre Fine Art Paper
* One Edition
* Original photo signed by the artist
